subject: Interview Request - Software Engineer
body:
Hi Jamal,

Thank you for your interest in TechCorp! We were impressed with your background and would like to move forward with an interview.

Would you be available for a phone screen next week? Please let us know your availability.

Best,
TechCorp Recruiting

subject: Next Steps - Your Application
body:
Hi Jamal,

Great news! We'd like to schedule a video call to discuss the Senior Engineer role.

Please use the following Calendly link to book a time that works for you.

Looking forward to speaking with you!

subject: Technical Assessment - Data Engineer
body:
Hi Jamal,

We would like you to complete a technical assessment as the next step in our interview process.

The take-home assignment should take approximately 2-3 hours. Please submit within 5 days.

Good luck!

subject: On-site Interview Invitation
body:
Dear Jamal,

Congratulations on making it to the final round! We would like to invite you for an on-site interview at our headquarters.

The day will include meetings with the hiring manager and team members.

Please confirm your availability.

subject: Schedule Your Interview
body:
Hi Jamal,

We're excited to meet you! Please schedule your interview using the link below.

You'll be meeting with our Engineering Lead to discuss your experience and the Platform Engineer role.

See you soon!
